name: ada-system-ops
description: Administrative tools for modifying Ada Stargate's operational parameters and asset registry.

tools.name: update_operational_rule
tools.description: Updates a specific marina rule or limit (e.g. speed limit, debt threshold).

rule_key.description: The internal key of the rule (e.g. 'speed_limit_knots')

tools.name: register_new_asset
tools.description: Adds a new vessel, tender, or vehicle to the active fleet registry.

name.description: The callsign or name of the asset.
